TextBlock.Text: CANARAE: These small-scale prototypes are proving promising. There is barely a sensation of heat when approaching them, though there is quite an electrical shock if not properly insulated.
HELIAN: Cedrus will ensure the key provides the needed insulation. Will we soon be ready to apply the same properties to Spark itself?
CANARAE: Very likely. Though I do not envy the one of us who will have to make the first trip into its core.
